original_text: During your life here on this earth, you have had all that you wanted. You have lived like kings. You have eaten as much food as you want. So now you are like fat animals that are ready for men to kill.
korean_text: 너희가 땅에서 사치하고 방종하여 살륙의 날에 너희 마음을 살찌게 하였도다

sentences.original_text: During your life here on this earth
you have had all that you wanted
You have eaten as much food as you want
So now you are like fat animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이제 너희는 살찐 동물들 같다

sentences.original_text: that are ready for men to kill
